hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Bow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.
